const CANVAS_SIZE = [500, 500]
const SNAKE_START = [
	[14, 13],
	[14, 14],
]
const APPLE_START = [8, 3]
const SCALE = 20
const SPEED = 120
const DIRECTIONS = {
	38: [0, -1], // up
	40: [0, 1], // down
	37: [-1, 0], // left
	39: [1, 0], // right
}

export {
	CANVAS_SIZE,
	SNAKE_START,
	APPLE_START,
	SCALE,
	SPEED,
	DIRECTIONS,
}
